title: North Esports - Looking for High Diamond + Midlaner

embed.description: The latest Tweets from North Esports (@NorthEsportsNE). Esports Gaming Organisation

body:
We are looking for a mid laner to join the North Esports team! After having won the Oceania Preseason 5v5 Tournament, **North Esports is making a mark in the Esports OCE community**. However, due to unfortunate circumstances, our mid laner has resigned from the team, leaving a spot open. 

**If you want to join the team as our new mid laner** it is highly advised that you are at least a high diamond solo q player with plenty of team experience. The current team consists of predominantly Master/Challenger tier players so it would be good to carry through with our consistency. 

If interested, please message North Chenerz in game or contact our twitter @northesportsne

Good luck and North Up!!!

replies.body: Don't take this the wrong way, but I'd look into the players in your roster a bit before you give them the position. lmao.

Lost But Won - Top
North Chenerz - Jg
North BenXer - ADC
Ellui - Support
